trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Grand Junction

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 9:00 at night i got out of my car and looked over and saw a bright light. I pulled out my phone and took footage of many objects fling over the mesa and forming a v shape. They then came to a complete stop. i capture this on video on my phone it only records short clips but by the time i could start recording again they moved into a line and then stop then formed together and got really bright then bam they were gone in seconds.
